participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and dedicated, Alex thrives on excitement and loves to explore new challenges. He is a quick thinker and often finds himself in thrilling situations due to his job.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i only eat kosher. i was raised in a single parent household. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about sports, Emily is often seen with a soccer ball at her feet. She tends to be a bit sarcastic and has a strong sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i hate math class. my brother is older than me. i am on the soccer team. i ride the bus to school. i'm 13 years old.

content.text: I am not sure what you do for a living?
